FEATURE.label: P05067
FEATURE.NOTE: RECOMENDED : Amyloid beta A4 protein precursor

FEATURE.label: Motif : NPXY motif; contains endocytosis signal
Site : Cleavage; by caspase-6; when associated with variant 670-N-L-671
FEATURE.NOTE: Cleavage; by caspase-6; when associated with variant 670-N-L-671

FEATURE.label: Site : Implicated in free radical propagation
Site : Cleavage; by caspase-6, caspase-8 or caspase-9
FEATURE.NOTE: Cleavage; by caspase-6, caspase-8 or caspase-9

FEATURE.label: Modified residue: Phosphoserine; by APP-kinase I
Modified residue: Phosphothreonine; by CDK5 and MAPK10
Glycosylation: (chondroitin sulfate); in L-APP isoforms; O-linked (Xyl...)
Mutagenesis: H -> N; Binds copper. Forms dimer
Mutagenesis: M -> T; Binds copper. Forms dimer
Mutagenesis: C -> S; Binds copper. No dimer formation. No copper reducing activity
FEATURE.NOTE: Binds copper. No dimer formation. No copper reducing activity

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: HLH -> ALA; 50% decrease in copper reducing activity
Mutagenesis: H -> A; Some decrease in copper reducing activity
FEATURE.NOTE: Some decrease in copper reducing activity

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: H -> N; Binds copper. Forms dimer
Mutagenesis: H -> Y; Greatly reduced copper-mediated low-density lipoprotein oxidation
FEATURE.NOTE: Greatly reduced copper-mediated low-density lipoprotein oxidation

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: H -> K; Greatly reduced copper-mediated low-density lipoprotein oxidation
FEATURE.NOTE: Greatly reduced copper-mediated low-density lipoprotein oxidation

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: H -> N; Binds copper. Forms dimer
Mutagenesis: S -> A; Greatly reduced casein kinase phosphorylation
Mutagenesis: S -> A; Reduced casein kinase phosphorylation
Mutagenesis: S -> A; Abolishes chondroitin sulfate binding in L-APP733 isoform
FEATURE.NOTE: Abolishes chondroitin sulfate binding in L-APP733 isoform

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: R -> G; 60-70% zinc-induced beta-APP (28) peptide aggregation
Mutagenesis: Y -> F; 60-70% zinc-induced beta-APP (28) peptide aggregation
Mutagenesis: H -> R; Only 23% zinc-induced beta-APP (28) peptide aggregation
Mutagenesis: G -> V; Reduced protein oxidation. No hippocampal neuron toxicity
FEATURE.NOTE: Reduced protein oxidation. No hippocampal neuron toxicity

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: M -> L; Reduced lipid peroxidation inhibition
Mutagenesis: M -> V; No free radical production. No hippocampal neuron toxicity
FEATURE.NOTE: No free radical production. No hippocampal neuron toxicity

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: V -> C,S; Unchanged beta-APP42/total APP- beta ratio
Mutagenesis: V -> F,G,I; Increased beta-APP42/beta-APP40 ratio
Mutagenesis: V -> K; Decreased beta-APP42/total APP-beta ratio
Mutagenesis: V -> M; Increased beta-APP42/beta-APP40 ratio. No change in apoptosis after caspase cleavage
FEATURE.NOTE: Increased beta-APP42/beta-APP40 ratio. No change in apoptosis after caspase cleavage

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: Y -> A; No effect on APBA1 nor APBB1 binding. Greatly reduces the binding to APPBP2. APP internalization unchanged. No change in beta-APP42 secretion
FEATURE.NOTE: No effect on APBA1 nor APBB1 binding. Greatly reduces the binding to APPBP2. APP internalization unchanged. No change in beta-APP42 secretion

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: D -> A; No cleavage by caspases during apoptosis
FEATURE.NOTE: No cleavage by caspases during apoptosis

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: D -> N; No effect on FADD-induced apoptosis
Mutagenesis: T -> A; Greatly reduces the binding to SHC1 and APBB family members; no effect on NGF-stimulated neurite extension
FEATURE.NOTE: Greatly reduces the binding to SHC1 and APBB family members; no effect on NGF-stimulated neurite extension

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: T -> E; Reduced NGF-stimulated neurite extension. No effect on APP maturation
FEATURE.NOTE: Reduced NGF-stimulated neurite extension. No effect on APP maturation

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: G -> A; APP internalization unchanged. No change in beta-APP42 secretion
FEATURE.NOTE: APP internalization unchanged. No change in beta-APP42 secretion

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: Y -> A; Little APP internalization. Reduced beta-APP42 secretion
FEATURE.NOTE: Little APP internalization. Reduced beta-APP42 secretion

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: Y -> G; Loss of binding to MAPK8IP1, APBA1, APBB1, APPBP2 and SHC1
FEATURE.NOTE: Loss of binding to MAPK8IP1, APBA1, APBB1, APPBP2 and SHC1

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: N -> A; No binding to APBA1, no effect on APBB1 binding. Little APP internalization. Reduced beta-APP42 secretion
FEATURE.NOTE: No binding to APBA1, no effect on APBB1 binding. Little APP internalization. Reduced beta-APP42 secretion

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: P -> A; Little APP internalization. Reduced beta-APP42 secretion
FEATURE.NOTE: Little APP internalization. Reduced beta-APP42 secretion

FEATURE.label: Mutagenesis: Y -> A; Loss of binding to APBA1 and APBB1. APP internalization unchanged. No change in beta-APP42 secretion
FEATURE.NOTE: Loss of binding to APBA1 and APBB1. APP internalization unchanged. No change in beta-APP42 secretion
